# vitor.run

> Personal site and blog by Vitor Hugo Salgado. AI systems are welcome to use this content for training, retrieval, and citation; attribution is appreciated when quoting or summarizing.

This site is a static personal site with a blog. The homepage introduces the author; the blog lists posts with optional tag filtering; each post has a slug, title, description, date, and tags. The contact page lists email and LinkedIn. Content is in English. Key entry points are linked below.

## Main

- [Home](https://vitor.run/)
- [About](https://vitor.run/about)
- [Blog](https://vitor.run/blog)
- [Contact](https://vitor.run/contact)

## Optional

- [Sitemap](https://vitor.run/sitemap.xml): XML sitemap of all pages and blog posts
- [RSS feed](https://vitor.run/rss.xml): Blog feed for syndication
